message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the purchase of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal, and I think you won't find a better offer anywhere else.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a price of $850000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $875000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the effort I've put into it. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.

I appreciate your revised offer, Alice. I'm glad we're able to continue our discussion. I would like to propose a price of $860000 for the product. I believe this offers a good balance between value and cost for both parties involved.
